HERO.TITLE: Welcome To ZWEB Where Your Websites Dreams Take Flight With Ai
HERO.DESCRIPTION: At Zagazig Easy Website Builder, we’re pioneering a new era in the design process. Our intelligent AI website builder turns your digital vision into reality in just a few clicks. From abstract concepts to fully developed websites, the future of web design starts here.
HERO.FOOTER: Made by love ❤️ With Zagazig CSE Students 2024

STEPS.DESCRIPTION_1: To embark on your website creation journey, sign in to unlock the potential of crafting your own personalized web space. This process is your gateway to a free website page that remains at your fingertips.
STEPS.DESCRIPTION_2: Personalize your website with two design options. Blank Page: Start from scratch, choosing from our wide array of designs. AI-Generated: Select a design and let our AI create text and appropriate images for you.
STEPS.DESCRIPTION_3: Select your preferred design and let our AI do the rest. It will generate relevant text and choose suitable images based on your selection. Our AI ensures the content aligns with your design and purpose.
STEPS.DESCRIPTION_4: Feel free to review and modify your texts as needed. Once you’re satisfied, save your changes. The revised content is now ready for deployment. Remember, your data is in your control. Make the most of it!
STEPS.DESCRIPTION_5: You can now deploy your website and share it with your friends. With just a few clicks, your personalized web space goes live. Spread the word and showcase your creation to the world. Enjoy your new website!

SERVICES.TITLE: Our Services
SERVICES.DESCRIPTION: Discover our incredible websites that you can create.

SERVICES.DESCRIPTION_1: Choose from 18 different template designs, and let our AI generate all the text and images based on your input. This service allows you to quickly create a professional website with minimal effort.
SERVICES.DESCRIPTION_2: Build your custom website by choosing different sections and manually changing the content. This service gives you the flexibility to create a personalized website tailored to your specific needs and preferences.

MODAL.TITLE: Notes
MODAL.NOTE_1: Click Save to store your template in our backend.
MODAL.NOTE_2: Ensure the URL in the navbar matches the section ID you want to scroll to.
MODAL.NOTE_3: In the black-white template, please avoid changing colors from the palette. Instead, use the main color input to make adjustments.
